Summary: and it was so bright that it wasn't moving I thought I was seeing thing's I had a teleascope but i never set it up. Strange, It was the moon .

divs: Sighting DetailsLast night I was looking from my front door I also seen a lot of helicopters but they were moving I'm not really sure what it was. I pull out my Bin I had that was 1000 yds. I was telling my wife this is strange but as I was looking at it was so bright it was in the L shape and I could see the stars in the back ground but this object was bigger than the stars, after a hour it seem to fade away I was going to use my camera but it was a 10x I never took a picture of it so I apology I have never saw something like this before, I wonder if anybody else seen what I saw last night.
